channel.title: Case Studies on Nadia Humbert-Labeaumaz
channel.description: Recent content in Case Studies on Nadia Humbert-Labeaumaz

item.title: Debt and SMEs in New Zealand
item.description: In this video, I will be talking about debt funding for small to medium businesses in NZ. Currently, we see how the media often underlines the low cost of money. While this might be true for individuals, especially for mortgages, the reality of SMEs is completely different. My goal will be to provide insights into the implications of the existing lending conditions for SMEs and some ideas for recommendations on improving the situation.

item.title: The Cloudy Relationship Between France and Diesel
item.description: After WWII, Charles de Gaulle boosted the French economy and helped road haulers, farmers and artisans who depended on diesel by reducing the taxation on this fuel for the first time.
